<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col v-for="post in posts" :key="post.id" cols="12" md="4">
          <v-card class="blog-card">
            <v-img :src="post.image" height="200px" class="mb-3"></v-img>
            <v-card-title class="headline">{{ post.title }}</v-card-title>
            <v-card-subtitle class="subheading">{{ formattedDate(post.date) }}</v-card-subtitle>
            <v-card-text>{{ post.summary }}</v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn :to="`/blog/${post.id}`" color="primary" text>Read More</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        posts: [
          { id: 1, title: 'First Blog Post', date: '2024-08-16', summary: 'This is a summary of the first blog post.', image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x200' },
          { id: 2, title: 'Second Blog Post', date: '2024-08-17', summary: 'This is a summary of the second blog post.', image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x200' },
          // Add more posts here
        ],
      };
    },
    methods: {
      formattedDate(dateString) {
        const options = { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' };
        return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString(undefined, options);
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .blog-card {
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .blog-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  }
  
  .v-card-title {
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  
  .v-card-subtitle {
    color: #6c757d;
  }
  
  .v-card-text {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }
  
  .v-btn {
    text-transform: none;
  }
  </style>
